title: parAtpara raghuvara
sahitya:
parAtpara raghuvara ninnu neranammitirA dayAkara 
sarOjabhava mukha surEharitArtta girIsha surucira sarasa madahara


anupallavi

  shirIsha sannibha sharIra shObhita dharAtmajA manOhara 
narEndra dasharatha sukumAra nannu maravakura inta parAkElara


caraNam    nIvE gatigAda nI dayalEda shrI vAsudEva 
dEvAdi dEva bhavanuta mahAnubhAvA midavibhava 
IvELa nA moralanu vinarAda muni jananutapAda 
rAvaNAdi ripudamana rakSita bhuvana pavana tanaya nityAnandada
